attributes.action: Reverse the decision to allow individuals the right to end to end encryption
attributes.additional_details: It’s a basic and fundamental human right to have my data protected from bad actors
attributes.background: Reverse the decision under the Investigatory Powers Act to allow individuals the right to have end to end encryption for their personal data  This is a fundamental human right

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Repeal the Investigatory Powers Act
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717199
